Hydras:

"The we should take advantage quickly of current situation, his ba=
se is under attack"said Hydras and soon he received an aencoded message fro=
m percepor "It seems that the puppet is done, Perceptor is coming"






  =
----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Richard Allen 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
  Sent: Thursday, November 01, 2007 7:58 PM
  Subject: Re: G2


  :=
:Scorponok::

  Scorponok: I guess I came at a good time then. The thought =
of destroying Rodimus Prime... or Hot Rod... Whatever he calls himself. Tha=
t foolish Targetmaster Autobot was a pain in many of my plans so long ago.
=

  Airshadow <airly2002@...> wrote:

    Hydras:

    Hydras hissed=
 and said dryly "gretings... now our chances to defeat Rodimus prime increa=
ses"


      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Richard Allen 
     =
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, October 30, 2007 12:43 PM=

      Subject: Re: G2


      ::Jhiaxus/Zarak/Scorponok::

      Jhiaxus: =
We'll use the puppet.

      Jhiaxus spins out of the chair and stands up t=
o greet the G2 newcomer.

      Outside the base the Scorponok body transfo=
rms to a standing position with Zarak becoming the head. Scorponok walks in=
to the base to eventually find Hydras and Jhiaxus.

      Scorponok: Lord J=
hiaxus, I am Scorponok; Headmaster warrior of the Generation 2 Decepticon E=
mpire.

      Jhiaxus nods...

      OOC: Hydras should recognize Scorponok=
 and know Zarak. And not like him I might ad.

      xochitla2006 <xochitla=
2006@...> wrote: 
        Hydras:

        Hydras typed some buttons =
and the doors opened he hissed "tell them 
        that they can come in an=
d I have more info bout this bot"

        A winged bot pictures, his wings=
 were dull black hue. His body was 
        a deep black with dull red high=
lights. 

        "Jsut we have to wait that perceptor send us the puppet..=
. unless 
        you want to do this personally..." said devilish Hydras

e:

er traveling underground for some time Scorponok comes to the

ace just outside Hydras' base. Zarak opens the top hatch and

s up top.
